remarks: Transfer ordered-pair existence from/to single variable existence. (Contributed by NM, 26-Feb-2014.)
statement:
exopxfr2.1 $e |- ( x = <. y , z >. -> ( ph <-> ps ) ) $.
exopxfr2 $p |- ( Rel A -> ( E. x e. A ph <-> E. y E. z ( <. y , z >. e. A /\ ps ) ) ) $.
$d A x y z $.
$d ph y z $.
$d ps x $.
